plot: A young kid named Matt learns about his father's death in a war which leads him to take a stand against his Arab best friend. His Arab friend decides to reveal a secret that will bridge their friendship again. How does Matt react?
title: Bridges
plot_es: A young kid named Matt learns about his father's death in a war which leads him to take a stand against his Arab best friend. His Arab friend decides to reveal a secret that will bridge their friendship again. How does Matt react?
plot_en: A young kid named Matt learns about his father's death in a war which leads him to take a stand against his Arab best friend. His Arab friend decides to reveal a secret that will bridge their friendship again. How does Matt react?
